name: Sticky Tongues
description:
Will you be the King of Frogs? Prove it by eating more frogs than your enemies, or kiss them to death.
Play it on a touch device against a friend to have the most fun^^

!!!I highly recommend playing this on your mobile, open this page on your mobile to get the most out of it!!!

This game was made in about 7 hours as a personal coding challenge in phaser and typescript. I wanted to learn more about multitouch.

CREDITS:
programming and art by me
sounds via partnersinrhyme.com
